callgraph
Class CallGraphConfig

java.lang.Object
  callgraph.CallGraphConfig
public class CallGraphConfig
extends java.lang.Object

The configuration for drawing a call graph, including the size, the position and the color of each procedure node and call site node.

Version:
1.01 (Last update: June 4, 2008)
Author:
Dr. Wen-jun LI, Da LUO
